channel.title: The game does not appear at Steam
channel.description:
Hi at all!
I've downloaded the game, installed and when finished, I've played the game for a while. But when I want to play again, I can't find it on my library at Steam. I've rebooted the Steam but nothing seems to happend...
So, what coud I do?
Thanks!

item.title: The game does not appear at Steam
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.source: The game does not appear at Steam

item.title: The game does not appear at Steam

item.description:
necotheone:

Hi at all!

I’ve downloaded the game, installed and when finished, I’ve played the game for a while. But when I want to play again, I can’t find it on my library at Steam. I’ve rebooted the Steam but nothing seems to happend…

So, what coud I do?

Thanks!

EDIT: I’ve istalled the game on the mod folder of steam and it works well.
